# Load Tidyverse

```{r packages}

library(tidyverse)

```

# Load Data

```{r datafile}

populations = readxl::read_xlsx("./data/population_data.xlsx") %>% 
  mutate(
    year = lubridate::ymd(year, truncated = 2L)
  )

```

# Graphs

```{r graphs}

populations %>% 
  filter(city %in% "nyc") %>% 
  ggplot() + geom_line(aes(x = year, y = population))

```
